mapper.select: select * from grade where sCode = #{sCode} and classCode = #{classCode}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO grade USING DUAL ON (classCode=#{classCode} and sCode = #{sCode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET attend=#{attend}, mid=#{mid}, otest=#{otest}, task =#{task}, fin=#{fin}, total=#{total} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES (#{sCode},#{sName},#{classCode},#{attend},#{mid},#{otest},#{task},#{fin},#{total},#{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
update grade set grade =#{grade} where classCode = #{classCode} and sCode = #{sCode}
